existing_features.title: Display 'Takshi' and 'Aashi' as sender names in chat messages instead of 'unknown'. When a message has no senderId or the senderId cannot be resolved to a profile, display the appropriate name based on the sender's identity (Takshi or Aashi).

Apply the 'Takshi' and 'Aashi' sender name display logic consistently across all apps in the project (ChatPage, DailyCheckInPage, ReactionsPage, and any other pages that display user-generated content).
Restrict admin panel access exclusively to the user 'takshi'. Only Takshi should be able to access the admin panel page and see the admin panel navigation option.

Implement automatic daily question generation or scheduling to ensure a new question appears every day. The system should either automatically create new questions or ensure that scheduled questions appear daily without manual intervention.

new_feature_requests.summary: Display 'takshi' and 'aashi' as sender names instead of 'unknown' for messages
Restrict admin panel access to 'takshi' only
Implement new question every day feature

projectName: Fix message sender display and enhance admin/daily question features
